name: Cube Flip - Grid Puzzles (iLLMaTiC_GameDev)
description:
Cube Flip is inspired by classic grid puzzle games. Challenging levels with a proper difficulty curve and colorful visuals with relaxing music keeps you focused in the game. 

Have Fun!

How To Play - 

  •  Move the box with arrows and collect all the boxes in level.  (Touch  Arrows For Mobile)
  • Walk on checkpoint to complete the level.
